title: Unicode support
body:
## Tokenizer
- [ ] add pass to check input files are valid as utf-8
  - requires https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/issues/2309
- [ ] add util function to check XID_Start/XID_Continue to libcpp
  - XID_Start, XID_Continue
    - https://www.unicode.org/Public/14.0.0/ucd/DerivedCoreProperties.txt
  - https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/pull/2284
- [ ] identifiers
  -  https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/pull/2284
- [ ] lifetime label
  -  https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/pull/2284
- [ ] raw identifiers
  - requires https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/issues/2309
- [x] string literal
- [x] char literal
- [x] Unicode esccape `\uxxxx`
- loop label 
  - not implemented yet 
- [ ] parse whitespaces
  - https://doc.rust-lang.org/reference/whitespace.html?highlight=whitespaces#whitespace
  - requires https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/issues/2309
- [ ] normalize identifiers (including labels) to NFC
  - ref: https://doc.rust-lang.org/beta/nightly-rustc/rustc_parse/lexer/fn.nfc_normalize.html
- [ ] add unit testing

## Parser
- [ ] check for `crate_name` attributes
  - https://doc.rust-lang.org/reference/crates-and-source-files.html#the-crate_name-attribute
  - Unicode Alphabetic
    - https://www.unicode.org/Public/14.0.0/ucd/DerivedCoreProperties.txt
  - Unicode Numeric (search with `Nl;` (decimal digits), `Nd;` (letter-like numeric), or `No;` (other numeric) )

## Backend
- [ ] v0 mangling
  - convert utf-8 to punycode
